title: Maid-sama! (2-in-1 Edition), Vol. 7: Includes Vols. 13 & 14
description: Misaki decides to tell Usui how she feels and goes on a date with him to the amusement park on Christmas Day! But with Cedric the spy following their every move, will she be able to say anything? Later, Usui drops some serious news that will affect his relationship with Misaki!
author: Hiro Fujiwara
